name: Samsung WB50F Smart Digital Camera (Red) with 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit

reviews.name: Samsung WB50F Smart Digital Camera (Red) with 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: I love this easy to use camera and the sharing WiFi features just add to the cameras easy-to-use features. The live panoramic feature is another excellent feature.
reviews.title: excellent point and shoot

reviews.name: Samsung WB50F Smart Digital Camera (Red) with 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: We have been waiting to buy a camera like this for a long time. We are busy with the social network and this camera has all of the features one could want, to share and save with all of your phones and computers. This Rocks!
reviews.title: Great Camera

reviews.name: Samsung WB50F Smart Digital Camera (Red) with 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: I've wanted a really good camera to replace my older digital camera. I tried other cameras and were disappointed........until I bought my Samsung. It has everything I wanted and at a great price. Try it, you'll like it!
reviews.title: Great Photography with my Samsung
